Back to Alexander Scriabin

Alexander Scriabin

Trois Morceaux, op. 2

1887 (nos. 1–2), 1889 (nos. 2–3)

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 5' 30"

  • 1. Étude in C-sharp minor
  • 2. Prélude in B major
  • 3. Impromptu à la mazur in C major

Recommended editions

  • Collected Works (Muzyka/Jurgenson) · II/7 · Pieces / Etudes · ed. Valentina Rubtsova / Pavel Shatsky
  • Könemann · K 213 · Preludes I · ed. Victor Ekimovsky [no. 2]
  • Könemann · K 220 · Etudes · ed. Victor Ekimovsky [no. 1]
  • Könemann · K 260 · Poèmes & Impromptus · ed. Victor Ekimovsky [no. 3]
  • Peters · EP 11070 · ed. Günter Philipp

1. Étude in C-sharp minor

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3

2. Prélude in B major

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2

3. Impromptu à la mazur in C major

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5
